name: Toil (RavenBP)
description:
Toil away in an attempt to reach your goals.

In Toil, the player must go through a set of rooms in a loop in order to increase their stats, once they feel confident enough they may attempt to reach their goal.

How to Play

Complete a loop to increase your stats. Reach the golden hourglass to complete the game.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim/Camera

Left Mouse - Fire Projectile

Spacebar - Jump

Tab (Hold) - View Stats

Escape/P - Pause

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Music by Cleyton R. Xavier (CC-BY 3.0)

Additional Info

I am aware of some of the bugs that you may encounter while playing, they shouldn't be game breaking however. I may revisit this project and expand upon it in the future.
